description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Aliens secretly love exploding. They invaded us. We'll just give them what they want. A quick, fiery death. Tear through endless waves of savage aliens in this retro shoot-em-up.
description.short: Aliens secretly love exploding. They invaded us. We'll just give them what they want. A quick, fiery death. Tear through endless waves of savage aliens in this retro shoot-em-up.
